name: spas-smugmug
readme:
# spas-smugmug

SmugMug API helpers for SPAS

## Installation

### Installing little-spas
``` bash
$ [sudo] npm install little-spas -g
```

### Installing spas-smugmug
``` bash
$ [sudo] npm install spas-smugmug
```

## Documentation spas-smugmug documentation can be found at http://dtex.github.com/spas-smugmugr
